integrate.heading: Integrate EguWallet into your service
integrate.subheading: Open SDKs and APIs â€” add trusted digital identity to your website or app in hours, not months
integrate.card1Body: Drop-in JavaScript SDK for websites and REST/native SDKs for Android and iOS. Add a Â«Verify with EguWalletÂ» button to your service â€” identity data arrives cryptographically signed, no manual verification needed.
integrate.card2Body: Relying parties must register with the national node. Until the Romanian national node is live, integration with EguWallet automatically covers registration through our own LOTL and certification services â€” removing the compliance hurdle entirely.
integrate.card3Body: Age verification, KYC/AML onboarding, self-exclusion checks, qualified electronic signature â€” all available through a single integration. Our SDK handles the OpenID4VP presentation flow, selective disclosure and audit logging for you.
